text: The National Tourism Agency (AKT) () is a government agency under the supervision of the Albanian Ministry of Tourism and Environment. The main task of the agency is to promote Albania as a tourist destination in the Mediterranean Basin, Europe and around the world. AKT organizes and manages the country's participation in international tourist fairs and provides on- line promotional offers to various international tour operators.http://wp.akt.gov.al/akt/rreth-nesh/ ==References== == External links == Tourism Category:Albania stubs
title: National Tourism Agency (Albania)
